TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_GJUSANA_000_030<tab>Now, I mentioned earlier that nine books comprise a set, but there are <var 1A 02 /var>different<var 1A 01 /var> sets as well. I had a quick browse through them, and it appears that each focuses on a particular weapon. If you have any preferences, please let me know.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_0000_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>Actions speak louder than words. Arm yourself with the relic weapon atma you wish to enhance, and speak with G'jusana once more.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_GJUSANA_000_040<tab>...Hm? It appears we're completely out of books pertaining to that weapon. And small wonder, seeing as you're the one who cleaned us out!
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>You have already completed all the trials for the equipped relic weapon atma. Make your way to Hyrstmill, and present it to Jalzahn.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_GJUSANA_000_050<tab>It appears you've already read all the books under that category. Might I interest you in something else?

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_GJUSANA_000_060<tab>Wait... Didn't I <var 1A 02 /var>just<var 1A 01 /var> sell you a book? As much as I'd like to offer you another, a part of me feels as though I'd be doing you a disservice. Think of it this way: the more you have, the less you appreciate!

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>You must complete all of the objectives in a book before you may purchase another. Alternately, you may also dispose of it by speaking with G'jusana, or via the Key Items menu.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_GJUSANA_000_070<tab>Here it is, the book of your heart's desire. I have no doubt that it'll provide endless hours of entertainment! Have there ever been 100 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 (( 28)) 0302 /var> better spent? I think not!
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>You have obtained a book from the Trials of the Braves. The objectives therein can be verified by using the item in the Key Items menu.
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_NOTE_TRADE_YESNO_Q<tab>Exchange <var 22 E804 ((,)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8030302 /var> for <var 31 ((EventItem)) 02E8020202 /var>?

Would you like to discard your <var 31 ((EventItem)) 04E8020202 /var>, and purchase <var 31 ((EventItem)) 02E8030202 /var> for <var 22 E805 ((,)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8040302 /var>?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_NOTE_TRADE_YESNO_YES<tab>Yes

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON025GETNOTE_00167_GJUSANA_000_080<tab>Oh dear, it seems you're short on <var 31 ((Item)) 04 (( 28)) 0302 /var>. I'm afraid I can't go any lower than 100 for such precious texts. Think of it this way: the harder you work for something, the more you appreciate it!
